nlpSummary: The issue involves a cyclic redirect between login and dashboard due to unhandled expired refresh tokens in the API interceptor.
logInsights: Interceptor fails to break loop on secondary 401
Missing clear token operation before redirecting

nlpSummary: Failure in processing Stripe webhooks for non-US currencies caused by assuming currency fields are always uppercase or defined.
logInsights: Accessing .toUpperCase() on undefined value in webhook handler

nlpSummary: Severe memory leak in Node.js worker processing video feeds via FFmpeg, eventually causing V8 to throw an Out of Memory error.
logInsights: V8 mark-compacts failing near heap limit
Possible unclosed streams in media parser
